Key: Kotori, you here?
...What?

Oh. I was curious about the Tengu Tower.
I was planning to check it out.
Translation:
Oh. Tenía curiosidad por la Torre Tengu.
Estaba planeando comprobarlo.

Key:
What? Are you still on about that? What's
there to be curious about?

Well, I can't explain it, but I just can't get
it out of my head.
Translation:
Bueno, no puedo explicarlo, pero
no puedo quitármelo de la cabeza.

Key: Did you want to accompany me?
Me...? On a night like this?

Well, if anything, I thought we could hit the
observation desk, look at the night sky, and
come back.
Translation:
En todo caso, pensé que podríamos
ir a la mesa de observación, mirar
el cielo nocturno y volver.

Key:
Is that... a roundabout way of asking me out
on a date?
Translation: ¿Es una forma indirecta de pedirme una cita?

Key:
O-Oh. Well, it is what it is, right? If...
that's okay with you, that is.
Translation:
O-Oh. Bueno, es lo que es, ¿no?
Si... te parece bien, claro.

Key:
I-If it's a date, then you should've said so
from the get-go. I won't reject you.
Translation:
Si es una cita, deberías haberlo dicho
desde el principio. No te rechazaré.

Key: I-I see... Then, let's take a night stroll.
Translation: Ya veo... Entonces, demos un paseo nocturno.

Key: Okay. I'm going to change, so wait for me.
Translation: Vale. Voy a cambiarme, así que espérame.

Key: Okay.

There's still a bunch of people here. Looks
like the tower's still open.
Translation:
Todavía hay un montón de gente aquí.
Parece que la torre sigue abierta.

Key:
Looking at the monument now, there's nothing
out of the ordinary. Guess it was all in my head.
Translation:
Mirando el monumento ahora, no hay nada fuera de
lo normal. Supongo que todo estaba en mi cabeza.

Key:
See, it was nothing. Jeez, I'm so busy and
you waste my time like this. What are you
going to do about it?
Translation:
Ves, no fue nada. Dios, estoy tan ocupada
y me haces perder el tiempo así.
¿Qué vas a hacer al respecto?

Key:
W-Well, there's gotta be something more.
I just want to be sure. Let's look at it a bit
closer.
Translation:
Bueno, tiene que haber algo más.
Sólo quiero estar seguro.
Veámoslo un poco más de cerca.

Key: Shido, step away!
Wh-What?!
What's going on?!
A-An Angel...?! Is that an Angel...?
(It's different from what the Spirits produce. Almost like a "guardian of some sort.")
Translation:
(Es diferente de lo que producen los Espíritus.
Casi como un "guardián de algún tipo").

Key: Whoa!
Shido!
I-I'm fine! It was just my foot.
Wh-What the hell is it?!
Rngh! It's after my feet!
Is it warning us? Telling us not to come near.
Translation:
¿Nos está advirtiendo? Diciéndonos
que no nos acerquemos.

Key: Then, is there some kind of secret here?!
Translation: Entonces, ¡¿hay algún tipo de secreto aquí?!

Key: What?! Is it attacking?!
Shido!
Kotori! You—!

Don't move, Shido!
Camael!
Ca-Camael...!
Cannon Mode: Megiddo!
...Kotori!
Wh-What was that thing...?!
Urgh!

It's disappearing. Almost like... the Spirit's
Astral Dress is disappearing.
Translation:
Está desapareciendo. Casi como... el Vestido
Astral del Espíritu está desapareciendo.

Key: Kotori! Are you okay?!
I'm fine. Shido, you're safe.
Translation: Estoy bien. Shido, estás a salvo.

Key: Thanks, Kotori. You saved me.

I-It's fine. I mean, I had no choice but to
fight!
Translation:
E-Está bien. Quiero decir,
¡no tuve más remedio que luchar!

Key:
Anyways, man. What was that thing? People
around us act like nothing happened. Didn't
they see it, too?
Translation:
De todos modos, hombre. ¿Qué fue eso?
La gente a nuestro alrededor actúa como
si nada hubiera pasado. ¿No lo vieron ellos también?

Key:
I sensed something very powerful. This is
a big deal.
Translation:
Sentí algo muy poderoso.
Esto es importante.

Key:
My hunch was right. This isn't just some
skyscraper. It must have something to do
with the barrier surrounding Tengu City.
Translation:
Mi corazonada era correcta. Esto no es sólo
un rascacielos. Debe tener algo que ver con
la barrera que rodea Ciudad Tengu.

Key:
Right. Looks like your hunches aren't as
off as I thought.
Translation:
Bien. Parece que tus corazonadas no
son tan erróneas como pensaba.

Key: I'm not your brother for nothing, huh?
Translation: No soy tu hermano por nada, ¿eh?

Key:
Shut up. As much as I hate to admit it, you
did well this time. I'll contact the Fraxinus
and look into it immediately.
Translation:
Cállate. Por mucho que odie admitirlo, esta vez
lo has hecho bien. Me pondré en contacto con
el Fraxinus y lo investigaré inmediatamente.

Key:
Guess our night stroll ends here, huh? It's a
bummer that we couldn't go up to the observation
deck.
Translation:
Supongo que nuestro paseo nocturno termina
aquí. Es una lástima que no pudiéramos
subir a la plataforma de observación.

Key:
Yeah. Let's go home for the day. We'll come
back another day.
Translation:
Sí. Vamos a casa por hoy.
Volveremos otro día.

Key: Right. That's a promise.
Mm... Promise.
